column1: Gamar Malamo Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Gamar Malamo) (IATA: GLX
column2: ICAO: WAEG) is the main airport serving the city of Galela
column3: Indonesia. It is located 15 kilometres (9.3 mi) northwest of Galela City in North Maluku in Indonesia. There are regular scheduled flights by Wings Air to Manado from this airport. The airport has one runway designated 04/22 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column5: 937 ft) in length. The Airport is operated and managed by UPT Ditjen Hubud. Address: Duma
column6: Galela Bar Kabupaten Halmahera Utara Maluku Utara Indonesia
